Art. 4.206. 
Debts and charges of the succession 
The legatee by particular title is not liable for the debts and charges of the succession, but he must, where applicable, suffer the reduction of his legacy and the hypothecary action of the creditors on the bequeathed immovable property.
A legatee by particular title who has paid the debt on the bequeathed property is subrogated to the rights of the creditor against the heirs, universal legatees and legatees by universal title.
